name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael THORPE, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael THORPE, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of April, 2012, the Application for Extraordinary Relief and the Application for Appointment of Counsel are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 858
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael THORPE, Petitioner.
No. 167 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 11, 2012.
